core:messageResource.core:message: An exception occurred while executing the MSI upgrade script

The update process did not execute successfully
The update could not be found due to an error
The update did not execute because an update is already in progress

Failed to initialise the MSI upgrade script
No MSI filename was provided in the MSI upgrade script
The MSI returned an error code after execution

The rmu-pre-delete-services update hook script returned an error code
The rmu-pre-kill-process update hook script returned an error code
The rmu-pre-install-bootstrap update hook script returned an error code
The rmu-pre-exec-msi update hook script returned an error code
Failed to initialise the custom upgrade
Failed to initialise the patch upgrade
An exception occurred while executing the custom upgrade
